name: Volume Panel
description:
Volume Panel is an enhanced replacement for your system volume control panel with an array of customisation options, all system volume controls available in one place plus screen brightness, media playback controls and a selection of additional shortcuts!

Check out our design pre-sets channel on Telegram and see what's possible at: [t.me/VPPresets](http://t.me/VPPresets)

Join in the conversation & keep up with the latest developments and ideas at: [t.me/volumepanel](http://t.me/volumepanel)

Go PRO for less than the price of a cup of coffee: [https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=leedroiddevelopments.volumepanel](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=leedroiddevelopments.volumepanel)

name: Github
description:
There's a lot you can do on GitHub that doesn't require a complex development environment – like making suggestions in a design discussion, or reviewing a few lines of code. GitHub for Android lets you move work forward wherever you are. Stay in touch with your team, assign proposals and even merge, right from the app. We're making these tasks easy to do, no matter where you work, with a great Android experience.

You can use GitHub for Android to:

- Browse your recent notifications
• Read, react and respond to issues and change requests
• Review and merge change requests
• Organize proposals using tags, assigning to people, projects and more
• Browse your files and code
• Discover new and trending repositories
